name: 梁曉帆
objective:
玄奘之路商學院戈壁挑戰賽緣起於 2006 年，秉承「玄奘之路」精神，倡導「理想、行動、堅持、超越」之理念，通過浸入式的身心體驗和團隊協作來達成個人心靈突破，並鼓勵參賽戈友相互扶持、共同進退，弘揚團隊合作、永不放棄的正向能量。
The Business Schools Xuanzang Road Gobi Challenge originated in 2006.
This event adheres to the spirit of "Xuan Zang Road", advocates the concept of "idealism, action, persistence, and transcendence" to achieve personal spiritual breakthrough through immersive physical and mental experience and teamwork; Gobi challenge also promotes teamwork by encouraging all participants to support each other, to advance and retreat together, and be positive, never give up!
materials: 活動相關知識與證照準備
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
課程是否導入AI: AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
